title: Attack Move Click
body: I Always find it annoying to miss my target while kiting so I saw this new attack move click strategy where I bind a key to it. I want to bind my left click to attack move click and right click to move around as usual but it won't let me. It doesn't let me bind left click to attack move click. Whenever I try binding it pretty much cancels the bind when I left click. Why?

replies.body:
You have to go into your actual config folder to set it like this.

Config folder location:
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config

Use the input.ini file

If you installed league elsewhere use that drive instead.

Go down to Game Event's and set

evtPlayerAttackMoveClick=[Button 1]

I'd also recommend setting your original Left click to middle click and learn to use that

evtPlayerSelectClick = [Button 3]


EDIT: Also as a note, you will need time to get used to it.
